name: The Yarn Company
description:
You are the new boss in a big Yarn Company, and it is up to you, to make it a big success. But something is threatening the Company, something alien and it says meow.

Controls:

You control the game with a mouse. Instructions is included in the game.

Keyboard shortcuts:

R: Restarts the level.

Escape: Quits the game

IMPORTANT

SOUND IS AN IMPORTANT PART OF THE GAME.

Good luck have fun
